name: Slinger Studios Inc.
description: Developer of video editing software designed to save the editing hours for video loggers. The company's software offers a wide range of features including unlimited cloud storage, the ability to import 4k footage, a jumpcut feature along with a cross-platform service, and automatically edit vlogs for users in real-time, enabling users to make and edit videos while reducing costs.
one_liner: Developer of video editing software designed to save the editing hours for video loggers. The company's software offers a wide range of features including unlimited cloud storage, the ability to import 4k footage, a jumpcut feature along with a cross-platform service, and automatically edit vlogs for users in real-time, enabling users to make and edit videos while reducing costs.
